title: 17 a New Land Bureau Saga
content:
Characters#[[Sephire]] ‚Äî [[paladin-oath-of-vengeance|Oath of Vengeance]] [[paladin|Paladin]] | [[warlock-the-fiend|The Fiend]] [[warlock|Warlock]] [[Minerva]] ‚Äî [[druid-circle-of-stars-tce|Circle of Stars]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/druid|Druid]] | [[cleric-life-domain|Life Domain]] [[cleric|Cleric]] [[Froggo]] ‚Äî [[ranger-gloom-stalker-xge|Gloom Stalker]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/ranger|Ranger]] | [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] Away#[[Verdian Suyanti]] ‚Äî [[bard-college-of-glamour-xge|College of Glamour]] [[bard|Bard]] [[Kairos]] ‚Äî [[rogue-soulknife-tce|Soulknife]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] [[Asep]] ‚Äî [[artificer-battle-smith-tce|Battle Smith]] [[artificer-tce|Artificer]] | [[wizard-bladesinging-tce|Bladesinging]] [[wizard|Wizard]] Session Overview#“The Frontier, tempat di mana ‘Weave’ dan ‘Divine Magic’ tidak bisa menjangkaunya. Di sanalah tempat paling tepat untuk menyimpan Artifact yang akan kalian ambil, karena dunia ini menahan seluruh bentuk sihir dari luar.”
~Ucap [[Pustakawan - Second-in-Command]] kepada Party.
Party berangkat menggunakan Pequod hingga mencapai titik di mana Ishmael dapat membuka portal menuju The Frontier. Ketika portal selesai dibuat, Party segera melangkah masuk dan bertemu dengan [[Professor Thinkwistle]]. Ia menjelaskan tentang keragaman The Frontier serta bagaimana ia berkomunikasi dengan Bureau of Time and Plane menggunakan alat, bukan sihir.
Ketika sedang menjelaskan, [[Professor Thinkwistle]] memberikan Artifact berbentuk batu berwarna karamel kepada Party. Mereka mengira misi ini akan sangat mudah. Namun ketika hendak kembali memasuki portal, portal tersebut tiba-tiba meledak dan melontarkan Party.
Tidak dapat kembali pulang, Party bertanya kepada [[Professor Thinkwistle]]. Ia merenung sejenak lalu menyimpulkan bahwa Party membutuhkan Genset, Dinamo, dan Kabel Tembaga, yang bisa dicari di Ye Olde Town. Ia kemudian memberikan sebuah [[revolver|Revolver]], 6 peluru, dan 4 ekor kuda. Barang tersebut dipegang oleh [[Asep]]. Menyadari bahwa senjata itu mematikan, [[Asep]] menyimpan pelurunya di dalam tas. Party kemudian berangkat menuju Ye Olde Town.
Sesampainya di kota, penampilan Party membuat penduduk memandang mereka aneh. Ada yang bahkan mengira mereka rombongan sirkus. [[Minerva]] mencoba membeli pakaian, namun baru menyadari bahwa di plane ini tidak ada pembayaran menggunakan [[gold-gp|Gold (gp)]], melainkan menggunakan mata uang kertas bernama Dollar. Ia menyampaikan hal itu kepada Party.
Tak lama, rombongan enam orang datang dengan tatapan sinis. Sementara itu, [[Kairos]] mencoba mencuri peluru dan [[revolver|Revolver]] dari [[Asep]], tetapi gang berisi enam orang itu memang ingin mencari gara-gara. [[Verdian Suyanti]] mencoba menenangkan situasi, namun sebuah tembakan dilepaskan dan nyaris mengenai kakinya.
[[Minerva]] lalu menyebutkan bahwa mereka sedang mencari [[Red Jack The Showman]], dan pemimpin geng itu menjawab bahwa mereka adalah ‚Äúteman‚Äù Red Jack, serta mengatakan bahwa ia ada di Saloon. Pertemuan pun berakhir damai dan Party menuju Saloon.
Saat masuk ke dalam Saloon, suasana ramai mendadak hening melihat Party. Mereka menuju Bartender untuk bertukar informasi. Party mengetahui bahwa [[Red Jack The Showman]] sedang bermain kartu ‚Äî dan tradisi The Frontier melarang siapapun mengganggu pemain kartu ‚Äî jadi Party menghabiskan waktu dengan berinteraksi di sekitar Saloon.
[[Minerva]] menjual satu kantong [[goodberry|Goodberry]] (20 buah) kepada Bartender seharga 20 cent dan 3 minuman terbaik di sana. Setelah meneguk minumannya, Party menjadi teler dan berjalan-jalan.
[[Froggo]] mencoba menggunakan [[pass-without-trace|Pass without Trace]] di plane tanpa sihir ‚Äî ia terkejut karena sihir itu berhasil. Ia segera melipir berkeliling seperti sedang bersembunyi.
Sementara itu [[Minerva]] dan [[Sephire]] mencari air di area parkir kuda. Ketika [[Minerva]] mengangkat [[Sephire]] dan menyandarkannya pada seekor kuda, kemudian melemparkan isi palung air ke arahnya, kuda yang berada di belakang [[Sephire]] terkejut dan menendangnya lalu kabur keluar kota.
Setelah situasi tenang kembali, permainan kartu [[Red Jack The Showman]] hanya menyisakan dirinya dan satu orang. Party menghampiri, orang tersebut bersalaman dengan Jack lalu pergi.
[[Red Jack The Showman]] mempersilakan Party duduk. Ia mendengarkan kebutuhan Party (Genset, Dinamo, Kabel Tembaga) dan mengatakan ia tahu di mana barang-barang itu berada. Namun ia memperingatkan:
‚ÄúJangan sampai ada yang tahu kalian dapat informasi ini dariku. Jika bocor‚Ä¶ aku pasti tahu siapa yang membocorkannya.‚Äù
Jack menjelaskan bahwa kereta milik [[Baron Blackthorn]] membawa banyak barang berharga, dan ia serta gengnya berencana ‚Äúmemerdekakan‚Äù barang-barang itu. Ia menawarkan kerja sama kepada Party dan meminta mereka menemuinya di Stormwood besok malam.
Ia memberikan 2 [[revolver|Revolver]] kepada [[Minerva]] dan [[Froggo]], 1 Double Barrel [[shotgun|Shotgun]] kepada [[Sephire]], serta 20 Dollar untuk membeli pakaian yang sesuai. Ketika Red Jack keluar dari Saloon, terdengar seseorang meneriakkan:
‚ÄúKEMANA KUDAKU?!?!‚Äù
Party keluar dengan sikap santai, kemudian pergi membeli pakaian dan menukarkan emas dengan Dollar melalui seorang ‚ÄúOrang Aneh Ye Olde Town‚Äù yang meminum botol bertuliskan ‚ÄúXXX‚Äù.
Ketika Party selesai berganti pakaian, mereka didatangi oleh [[Marshal Eliza Kane]], pelindung Ye Olde Town. Party menanyakan barang yang dicari [[Professor Thinkwistle]], dan Marshal menyanggupi bahwa ia bisa memberikannya ‚Äî jika Party membantu melindungi kereta [[Baron Blackthorn]], yang menurut informasinya akan dirampok. Kereta itu menuju tambang emas besar milik sang Baron.
Jika Party tertarik, [[Marshal Eliza Kane]] akan menunggu di Menara Jam besok siang.
Party pun merencanakan untuk bermain dua sisi: bekerja sama dengan Red Jack sekaligus Marshal Eliza. Namun mereka memutuskan untuk mandi dulu di Bathhouse.
Di Bathhouse, [[Froggo]] mendengar percakapan bahwa geng [[Red Jack The Showman]] berhasil mencuri tanki oli dan akan menggunakannya untuk merampok kereta. Ia menunggu sampai orang itu keluar dan melihat seorang pria bertopi hitam, berpakaian gelap, membawa [[revolver|Revolver]] dengan gagang ivory.
Setelah mandi, [[Froggo]] menyampaikan informasi tersebut. Party menutup hari dengan menyewa kamar di Inn dan berdiskusi tentang rencana besok.
Key Learnings#[[Professor Thinkwistle]] membutuhkan Genset (Generator), Dinamo, Kabel Tembaga. [[Red Jack The Showman]] dan 6 Orang Gang nya akan merampok kereta milik [[Baron Blackthorn]]. [[Marshal Eliza Kane]] berencana melindungi kereta milik [[Baron Blackthorn]]. Orang Ber-Topi Hitam, Ber Jaket Hitam dengan [[revolver|Revolver]] gagang Ivory mengetahui rencana [[Red Jack The Showman]] yang akan menggunakan tanki oli. Who Did They Meet?#[[Professor Thinkwistle]] Penjual di General Store 6 Orang Gang [[Red Jack The Showman]] Bartender Saloon Ye Olde Town [[Red Jack The Showman]] Orang Aneh Ye Olde Town yang Meminum Botol Bertanda ‘XXX’ [[Marshal Eliza Kane]] Bathkeeper Innkeeper Items Of Importance#1 [[revolver|Revolver]] dan 6 peluru (tersisa 4) di tangan [[Asep]]. 2 [[revolver|Revolver]] dan 22 peluru di tangan [[Froggo]]. 1 [[shotgun|Shotgun]] dan 12 peluru di tangan [[Sephire]]. Artifact Bureau berwarna Karamel. What Worked#

title: 18 the Long Ride to Stormwood
content:
Characters#[[Sephire]] ‚Äî [[paladin-oath-of-vengeance|Oath of Vengeance]] [[paladin|Paladin]] | [[warlock-the-fiend|The Fiend]] [[warlock|Warlock]] [[Minerva]] ‚Äî [[druid-circle-of-stars-tce|Circle of Stars]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/druid|Druid]] | [[cleric-life-domain|Life Domain]] [[cleric|Cleric]] [[Froggo]] ‚Äî [[ranger-gloom-stalker-xge|Gloom Stalker]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/ranger|Ranger]] | [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] [[Verdian Suyanti]] ‚Äî [[bard-college-of-glamour-xge|College of Glamour]] [[bard|Bard]] [[Kairos]] ‚Äî [[rogue-soulknife-tce|Soulknife]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] (Absent) [[Asep]] ‚Äî [[artificer-battle-smith-tce|Battle Smith]] [[artificer-tce|Artificer]] | [[wizard-bladesinging-tce|Bladesinging]] [[wizard|Wizard]] Session Overview#The party arrived in the Frontier Plane, traveling through the dead woods of Stormwood ‚Äî a forest scarred by lightning strikes, perpetual fog, and silence.
They were guided to Red Jack‚Äôs hideout, a temporary base hidden deep within the forest.
The party was given time to rest extensively (16 hours total), burning through Hit Dice and preparing for a high-risk operation scheduled for the following midnight.
Red Jack briefed the party on the plan:
An oil tank carriage had already been smuggled into a cave in Le Grant Kanyun The party‚Äôs task was to stop the Baron‚Äôs train using the carriage and secure its contents The tone of the session emphasized inevitability ‚Äî no speeches, no rallying cries, just preparation and quiet resolve.
Key Learnings#This plane operates on violence as procedure, not chaos Red Jack is not reckless ‚Äî he is resigned Rest does not erase dread; it only delays it Who Did They Meet?#Red Jack ‚Äî Outlaw leader, visibly tired, quietly determined Items Of Importance#Oil Tank Carriage ‚Äî Volatile, central to stopping the train Maps of Le Grant Kanyun and surrounding rail lines What Worked#Extended downtime increased tension instead of reducing it The environment reinforced the theme of ‚Äúno clean exits‚Äù Players leaned into preparation and role separation

title: 19 the Standoff of Centuries
content:
Characters#[[Sephire]] ‚Äî [[paladin-oath-of-vengeance|Oath of Vengeance]] [[paladin|Paladin]] | [[warlock-the-fiend|The Fiend]] [[warlock|Warlock]] [[Minerva]] ‚Äî [[druid-circle-of-stars-tce|Circle of Stars]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/druid|Druid]] | [[cleric-life-domain|Life Domain]] [[cleric|Cleric]] [[Froggo]] ‚Äî [[ranger-gloom-stalker-xge|Gloom Stalker]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/ranger|Ranger]] | [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] [[Verdian Suyanti]] ‚Äî [[bard-college-of-glamour-xge|College of Glamour]] [[bard|Bard]] [[Kairos]] ‚Äî [[rogue-soulknife-tce|Soulknife]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] (Absent) [[Asep]] ‚Äî [[artificer-battle-smith-tce|Battle Smith]] [[artificer-tce|Artificer]] | [[wizard-bladesinging-tce|Bladesinging]] [[wizard|Wizard]] Session Overview#The session opened directly at the train tracks cutting through a canyon near Le Grant Kanyun.
The party split:
Minerva, Sephire, Froggo halted the train using the oil tank carriage Asep and Verdian took overwatch positions along the canyon rim Combat erupted against Baron Rail Guards.
Despite heavy cover and firearm lethality, the party successfully neutralized the guards and secured the train.
Inside the seventh carriage, the party discovered the true objective:
Baron‚Äôs Company Bonds, tied directly to state power and legitimacy Moments later, a massive dust cloud approached.
Marshal Eliza Kane arrived with an overwhelming posse (~40 riders).
Outnumbered, wounded, and cut off, the party fled into Le Grant Kanyun.
At dusk, deep within the canyon:
The party encountered a gravely wounded Red Jack Moments later, a wounded Marshal Kane arrived Words failed.
A three-way duel began:
Minerva Red Jack Marshal Eliza Kane Marshal Kane shot Red Jack dead.
Before she could turn on Minerva, she was killed by a distant sniper.
The sniper revealed himself as Angel Eye, mounted and composed.
Red Jack‚Äôs revolver was empty.
Angel Eye refused further violence, stating:
‚ÄúTheir time is over.‚Äù
He introduced himself only as John, then vanished deeper into the canyon.
The party buried Red Jack and Marshal Kane.
Minerva took Red Jack‚Äôs hat and Kane‚Äôs Marshal star ‚Äî and wore both.
Key Learnings#Victory and failure are sometimes indistinguishable Intervening does not mean owning the outcome Some conflicts end without closure ‚Äî only survivors Who Did They Meet?#Red Jack ‚Äî Died in the canyon Marshal Eliza Kane ‚Äî Died in the canyon Angel Eye (John) ‚Äî Sniper, unaffiliated, unknowable Items Of Importance#Red Jack‚Äôs Hat Marshal Kane‚Äôs Star Professor Thinkwistle‚Äôs Components (secured) What Worked#The Mexican Standoff mechanic created genuine silence at the table No dialogue-heavy resolution increased emotional weight Players carried consequences forward without mechanical reward

title: 20 the Aftermath
content:
Characters#[[Sephire]] ‚Äî [[paladin-oath-of-vengeance|Oath of Vengeance]] [[paladin|Paladin]] | [[warlock-the-fiend|The Fiend]] [[warlock|Warlock]] [[Minerva]] ‚Äî [[druid-circle-of-stars-tce|Circle of Stars]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/druid|Druid]] | [[cleric-life-domain|Life Domain]] [[cleric|Cleric]] [[Froggo]] ‚Äî [[ranger-gloom-stalker-xge|Gloom Stalker]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/ranger|Ranger]] | [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] [[Verdian Suyanti]] ‚Äî [[bard-college-of-glamour-xge|College of Glamour]] [[bard|Bard]] [[Kairos]] ‚Äî [[rogue-soulknife-tce|Soulknife]] [[03.PlayerLog&Handouts/Mechanics/CLI/classes/rogue|Rogue]] (Absent) [[Asep]] ‚Äî [[artificer-battle-smith-tce|Battle Smith]] [[artificer-tce|Artificer]] | [[wizard-bladesinging-tce|Bladesinging]] [[wizard|Wizard]] Session Overview#The party returned to the Grand Library Space Port.
At a small container-shaped bar, a familiar Dwarven Bartender noted the unusual increase in field deployments and whispered rumors of Bureau interest in Netherese artifacts.
The party encountered [[Elira]], the Paladin‚Äôs daughter from the second artifact plane, now working junior requisitions.
An awkward moment unfolded between Sephire, Asep, and Elira ‚Äî unresolved, quietly human.
Attempted eavesdropping outside Pustakawan‚Äôs office ended abruptly when Verdian fell through the door.
Inside:
Shaperite appeared altered ‚Äî mechanical left arm, eyepatch, visibly changed The moment between Shaperite and Pustakawan never fully landed During debrief:
Pustakawan classified the Frontier Plane as ‚Äúresolved‚Äù Professor Thinkwistle was officially ghosted Further involvement was deemed destabilizing The party requested leave.
Waterdeep was deemed unsafe due to Blood War spillover Sigil was quarantined by the Lady of Pain The party was granted rest within Agent Dormitories Later, in the Library:
The party researched Ravenloft Learned of Count Strahd von Zarovich, last recorded 400 years ago Discovered truths about Vampire Spawn and coffin-bound recovery Finally, Pustakawan briefed the party:
Two agents active: ADAM (local) and HAWA (external) Intelligence incomplete The party was instructed to trust their judgment Key Learnings#The Bureau records outcomes, not experiences Rest does not mean recovery Trust will be tested ‚Äî and information will be incomplete Who Did They Meet?#Pustakawan ‚Äî Liason, controlled, distant Shaperite ‚Äî Changed, quiet, unresolved Elira ‚Äî Junior agent, reminder of past consequences Dwarven Bartender ‚Äî Witness to systemic escalation Items Of Importance#Ravenloft archival texts Agent dossiers: ADAM, HAWA What Worked#Low-action session allowed emotional decompression Bureau bureaucracy contrasted sharply with lived trauma Players reflected without being prompted mechanically
